means: （尤指男性）极端守旧的，粗鲁的，未开化的
（欧洲生活在3.5万年至7万年之前的）尼安德特人的
（指男性）原始人，野蛮人，凶猛粗鲁的人

sentence.Network_en: Neanderthal man was able to kill woolly mammoths and bears.
sentence.Network_cn: 尼安德特人能够捕杀浑身覆毛的猛犸象和熊。

sentence.Network_en: Let us deal with the question of his notoriously Neanderthal attitude to women.
sentence.Network_cn: 我们现在来说说他臭名昭著的、对女性态度粗鲁的问题。

sentence.Network_en: In fact, many sympathized with me for having to put up with such a neanderthal of a boss.
sentence.Network_cn: 实际上，很多人同情我不得不忍受这样一个粗鲁的老板。

PerfectNetExp.abs: neamine 新霉素A, neanderthal 尼安德特尔人, neandertal 穴居人的

list.abs: 一、尼安得特人(Neanderthal man)。相当数量来自欧洲、非洲、甚至亚洲的化石共同地但宽松地被认为是尼安得特人种的代表。西欧的标本很有特色,似乎代表了生活在西欧冰期.
there were only a few thousand neanderthals in southern france ., 在法国南部 , 只有几千的尼安德特人.

a neanderthal ability to travel across small stretches of sea would help explain why the Iberian peninsula has older examples of human remains than , say , France .尼安德塔人能够穿越小片海洋的能力可以帮助解释为何伊比利半岛有比法国还早的人类遗迹。
neanderthals evolved large noses to warm their breath ., 尼安德特人进化出大鼻子来温暖空气.

entry.tran: (欧洲生活在3.5万年至7万年之前的)尼安德特人的
entry.def: Neanderthal people lived in Europe between 35,000 and 70,000 years ago.

example.ex: Neanderthal man was able to kill woolly mammoths and bears.
example.tran: 尼安德特人能够捕杀浑身覆毛的猛犸象和熊。

entry.tran: (尤指男性)极端守旧的，粗鲁的，未开化的
entry.def: If you describe people's, especially men's, ideas or ways of behaving as Neanderthal, you disapprove of them because they are very old-fashioned and uncivilized.

example.ex: Let us deal with the question of his notoriously Neanderthal attitude to women.
example.tran: 我们现在来说说他臭名昭著的、对女性态度粗鲁的问题。

entry.tran: (指男性)原始人，野蛮人，凶猛粗鲁的人
entry.def: If you call a man a neanderthal, you disapprove of him because you think he behaves in a very uncivilized way.

example.ex: In fact, many sympathized with me for having to put up with such a neanderthal of a boss.
example.tran: 实际上，很多人同情我不得不忍受这样一个粗鲁的老板。

means.word_mean: 1. ill-mannered and coarse and contemptible in behavior or appearance;

auth_sentence.content: The conditions were correct for Neanderthal so it developed.
auth_sentence.res_content: The conditions were correct for Neanderthal so it developed.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The conditions were correct for Neanderthal so it developed.

auth_sentence.content: Early man could run down any prey including neanderthal.
auth_sentence.res_content: Early man could run down any prey including neanderthal.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Early man could run down any prey including neanderthal.

auth_sentence.content: The next stage was to add the Neanderthal's muscles.
auth_sentence.res_content: The next stage was to add the Neanderthal's muscles.
